constituent: mineral, metal, gold, wide, cave, elbow
koohiiStory1: Elbonium: a new mineral found in wide caves shaped like elbows and made of metal.
koohiiStory2: A wide range of metals are classed as minerals.
myStory: khoáng sản. kim loại mở rộng
